snippet: Garbage disposals have not been illegal in New York City homes since 1997, but they remain rare, and some buildings still do not allow them.
abstract: Elizabeth A Harris The Appraisal column notes that garbage disposals can put a valuable boost into a New York City real estate listing; appliances are still rare in New York because they were illegal under city law until 1997, and many apartment buildings, especially older ones, continue to ban them to protect aging pipes.
lead_paragraph: Garbage disposals have not been illegal in New York City homes since 1997, but they remain rare, and some buildings still do not allow them.

headline.seo: Garbage Disposals Are the New Kitchen Amenity
headline.main: Besides the Gym and Great Views, Don’t Forget to Mention the Garbage Disposal
headline.print_headline: Besides the Gym and Great Views, Don’t Forget to Mention the Garbage Disposal
